title: Social Media Assistant / Moderator (Night Shift Support)
job_overview:
Send your CV here:Upgrade to see actual info


We are hiring Social Media Assistants / Moderators to manage community interactions and platform hygiene during the night shift. This role is critical for maintaining brand integrity and audience engagement across social channels.

Key Responsibilities:
Monitor and moderate comments, messages, and posts to ensure compliance with guidelines.
Support content updates and cleanup actions as directed (e.g., post deletions).
Escalate issues or flag inappropriate content as needed.
Assist in implementing content schedules or engagement prompts.
Coordinate with team leads on shift handovers and daily summaries.
